title: Revived Warrior - Novel Updates
tags: Artificial Intelligence   Clever Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Level System   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Skill Books   Sword And Magic   Time Skip   Unlucky Protagonist   Virtual Reality
author: Shiou   施鸥
description:
Professional game player Yu Tian is a master of online games. He has always been the number one in every ranking list. Once he was planning to defeat the final boss named Devil Xueke. But contrary to his expectations, Devil Xueke has already evolved out its own intelligence and he attacked Yu Tian’s brain which made him into a vegetative patient……

One day after 20 years, almost all of the people are looking at the game channel on TV. There will be a new online game named “The Unlimited World” which shall start running. In order to promote his game, the chairman of the board named Huangzuan gives Yu Tian a full set of game equipment. Surprisingly, the game helmet can let Yu Tian join the game. Let’s wait and see what will happen on Yu Tian in “the Unlimited World”.>
